content: this easy crochet dishcloth pattern is a great place to start if you re looking for a super quick project especially if you re not into scarves headbands or endless swatches dishcloths and washcloths are a practical little project because you get to practice fun and interesting stitches and actually use what you make when you re done in this easy guide i ll walk you through the steps to crochet a simple dish cloth from start to finish
